psos.description: Analyze engineering problems using modern tools and techniques.
Demonstrate technical knowledge relevant to the program.
Apply ethical principles in professional engineering practice.

pos.name: Engineering Knowledge
pos.content: Apply knowledge of mathematics, science, and engineering.

pos.name: Design and Development of Solutions
pos.content: Design solutions for complex engineering problems.

pos.name: Modern Tool Usage
pos.content: Use modern engineering tools for practice.

pos.name: Ethics
pos.content: Commit to professional ethics and responsibilities.

pos.name: Individual and Team Work
pos.content: Work effectively as an individual and team member.

pos.name: Project Management and Finance
pos.content: Manage projects and demonstrate financial literacy.

pos.name: Life-long Learning
pos.content: Engage in independent and life-long learning.
